page.title: 08CHANGING TIMES, CALDER VALE
page.content:
People who have lived in Calder Vale for a long time have told us that the village has changed quite a lot and the green used to be a quarry until it was filled in many years ago.
The houses in Long Row are over a 100 years old. In Calder Vale there used to be a cafe and a chip shop.The chip shop used to be in the Mill Square.
There used to be another mill, called Lower Mill, but this was demolished after it was closed down.
Until 15 years ago Calder Vale used to have its own brass band.
There used to be a Temperance Hotel where Mount Pleasant now is. This is now a house overlooking the Mill Square.
